tweet: @AmbienceFineArt Not me, I only go to the Brecon craft fair at the moment and that's this Saturday (a 5:30am start and 12 hours  inc travel)
It's finally happened, I said 'tada' to the delivery man without thinking. Living in Swansea Valley is rubbing off on me, innit.... :-)
Let me know by Thursday midday as I will deflate them then. I hate having to chuck them, but have no use for them...
Does anyone have any use for plastic pillows of air for packing? I have 2 boxes full and will only have to deflate and take to landfill...
Details for my Xmas exhibition are now on the Gower News website. http://bit.ly/1jQwMm Thanks @gowernews :-) #mumbles #swansea #gower
